Without organized labor, we wouldn’t have:

✅ a minimum wage
✅ workplace safety protections
✅ overtime pay

On #LaborDay (and every day!), we celebrate our union brothers and sisters in the struggle for economic justice. I stand with you in that fight. 

Happy Labor Day!
